There are several missing elements from the assignments page. Needs to be updated and the following added to it.

Remove loss type
Show all 3 phonenumbers
Better Date formatting - Month, Day year
Always show pencil

Weather -
Add max hailsize and damage probability to storm details

Property Data
Unit B or Number B on assignment 11 to check better data
Scrollable box for drone information

Photos -
Upload Photo doesn’t allow click
Upload Photo Rework - do line by line.

Documents
Same upload rework, allow type
uploaded by needs to be name

Remove loss type
Show all 3 phonenumbers
Better Date formatting - Month, Day year
Always show pencil

Weather -
Add max hailsize and damage probability to storm details

Property Data

Scrollable box for drone information

Photos -
Upload Photo doesn’t allow click
Upload Photo Rework - do line by line.

Documents
Same upload rework, allow type
uploaded by needs to be name
